VASSAL.build.module.map

Class GlobalMap

  • java.lang.Object
    • VASSAL.build.module.map.GlobalMap
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    AutoConfigurable, Buildable, Configurable, GameComponent, Drawable, Translatable

    public class GlobalMap
extends java.lang.Object
implements AutoConfigurable, GameComponent, Drawable
    This is scaled version of a Map that gives an overview. Users can navigate around the Map by clicking on the GlobalMap, which draws a rectangular region of interest (ROI) indicating the current viewable area in the map window.
